headline: Jim Cramer Says He’s “Sure” Palantir (PLTR) Will Get Business
summary: We recently published 12 Stocks Jim Cramer Mentioned In An Episode Where He Briefly Commented On Data Centers. Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:PLTR) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Cramer discussed Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:PLTR) in the context of reports discussing that the Trump administration might furlough 550,000 federal employees in case of […]
